Eligibility: Women with histological/cytological confirmation of breast cancer.
Subjects with measurable injury or bone damage
Important heart events, arrhythmias or other heart conditions
Results: Number of patients with disease progression event
Number of patients with objective progression of disease or death (by any cause in the absence of objective progression)

Time frame: Evaluations of RECIST tumours performed during screening (within 3 weeks prior to the first dose) and then according to clinical practice of the site until objective progression. The only additional mandatory RECIST evaluation is at the cut-off point.
Title of the arm/group: Vandetanib Plus Docetaxel
Description of the arm/group: vandetanib 100 mg plus docetaxel
Title of the arm/group: Placebo Plus Docetaxel
Description of the arm/group: placebo plus docetaxel
